inn1.comm: starts off with his stock delivery, the yorker, on off stump, the batsman gets an inside edge down to fine leg as he jams his bat at that.
oh nice one, it's full and it swings away from the batsman, who didn't really come forward and gets beaten
another away swinger outside off, the batsman opens the face of the bats and runs it down to third-man
he loves this length, another yorker on off stump, swings into the right-hander too, Tamim blocks it out towards the leg side
full delivery just outside off, it has got a bit of a shape on it and the batsman gets an inside edge towards midwicket as he comes forward to defend that
back of length delivery on the middle, it is tucked to the left of midwicket for a quick single
he does what he does all the time, swings this one away from a length, the batsman comes forward and lets it go through
he has seen enough deliveries now, he charges down the track and tries to slam it over cover, but ends up slicing it over point for a couple
full delivery on the pads, it is flicked down to fine leg for a single
bowls length outside off, the ball comes in to the right-hander, who punches it to point off the back foot
too much swing on this one as it goes down the leg side and it's too far from Sanga, the keeper
bowls an away going delivery wide outside off, the batsman watches it go though to the keeper
he stands up tall and punches the short of length delivery through cover for a couple
the slower bouncer on the body which Tamim defends towards point off the back foot
another short delivery on off stump, it comes slow off the surface and the batsman defends it easily
oh good yorker, quick as well and it swings into the batsman, Tamim blocks it out
a short delivery to follow up the yorker, the batsman sways out of line
goes for a slower delivery, but this one is down the leg side and Tamim glances it down to fine leg
another short delivery, the batsman ducks under it
length delivery on the pads, the batsman drives it straight to midwicket
fuller delivery, but this one is on the pads and the batsman gets a faint tickle on it as the ball goes fine through the leg side for a boundary
back of length delivery on off stump, squares up the batsman a bit as he defends off the back foot
he comes forward and defends solidly towards mid-off
strays on the pads again and the batsman nudges it down to fine leg
oh nice one, this one swings in late into the batsman, who tries to defends it towards the leg side but closes the face a little early, gets a leading edge down to third-man
this was close as Anamul gets and inside edge past the stumps to fine-leg
low full-toss on the middle stump, the batsman defends it towards the leg side
back of length delivery  on off, the batsman dabs it to the right of point fielder, Dilshan there makes a diving stop, but an easy single is taken
length delivery just outside off, Anamul watches it go through to the keeper
that's a beamer! He was going for a slower delivery and this just slips out of hands, the batsman just ducks under it in time as that was going head high on him. It's a big front-foot no ball too
he is unable to use the free-hit to his advantage as he just gets a toe-end to a low full-toss, pushed to mid-off
another yorker on off stump, the batsman pushes it towards wide mid-on and calls for a quick single
length delivery on off stump, the batsman gets squared up as he defends it to off
another one down the leg side and the batsman helps it on its way to the fine-leg boundary
fuller length delivery on the stumps, it's slightly slower than normal, Tamim pushes it towards wide mid-on and calls for a quick run
length delivery outside off, the batsman comes forward and defends
fuller length delivery wide outside off, the batsman stretches and slices it through gully, to third-man
back of length delivery on off stump, defended to point
full delivery outside off, swings a touch away, the batsman drives it past point for a couple
back of length delivery outside off, Anamul goes on the back foot and punches it to short cover
stays a little low and takes the inside edge on to the pads as Anamul plays the length delivery off the back foot
he stays back and punches the length delivery outside off to the man at cover
this time he finds the gap with the shot he has been trying to play for the last two balls, cut away through cover-point off the back foot
he waits on the back foot and pushes the back of length delivery to midwicket
full and on the pads, it's glanced fine to Malinga at fine-leg, who fumbles and the batsmen call for a second. But a flat through comes in and hits the stumps direct, but Tamim made it in time..
this one is gorgeous! Length delivery just outside off, the batsman takes a step forward and drives it through cover for a good-looking boundary
back of length delivery, hits the thigh pad as the batsman tries to tuck it to leg side, they run the leg-bye
oh no! He stays on the back foot to a length delivery and pays the price as the ball comes in a touch, but more importantly, stays low. It takes the inside edge and splays the stumps
good first delivery, it is bowled on a length, draws the batsman forward and swings past the outside edge
back of length delivery on off stump, the batsman defends it to cover off the back foot
angled in from round the wicket, the batsman flicks it through square leg, all along the ground and it beats the fielder to the boundary
charges out of the crease and blasts it over cover for another boundary
length delivery on off stump, the batsman comes forward and defends it solidly
strays on to the pads, Tamim guides it easily to fine-leg for a single
the batsman comes forward and defends the length delivery to the off side
length delivery outside off, the batsman comes forward and then decides to let it go
cracked through cover point! He sees the width early and then crashes it through the off side, on the up.
length delivery on the off stump line, Tamim comes forward and tries to push it to cover, but gets an inside edge towards short midwicket
good delivery just outside off, the batsman comes forward and then lets it go through
beats the bat as he gets one to dart away off a length, there was some extra pace on that too
back of length delivery, just comes in a touch and the batsman guides it straight to point
full delivery outside off, the batsman crunches it to the off side , but straight to the fielder at short cover

brilliantly caught at mid-off! It was a length delivery on off stump and Ashraful tries to drive it on the up, but the ball stopped on him a bit and he ended up chipping it towards mid-off where Kushal Perera runs and dives forward to scoop it just before it hits the turf. Very well taken, the umpires check if the catch was clean, and clean it is.
full delivery on the off stump, the batsman flicks it fine on the leg side
length delivery just outside off, the batsman waits on the back foot and chops it down to third-man
back of length delivery on off stump, Mush defends it off the back foot
length delivery, defended to the off side off the back foot
he comes forward and pushes the length ball straight to the fielder at cover
full delivery on off, the batsman punches it firmly back to the bowler
stays on the back foot and opens the face of the bat to run it down to third-man
back of length delivery on the stumps, the batsman tucks it away to fine-leg for a single
length delivery on the pads, it is punched to deep midwicket for a single
back of length delivery on off stump, the batsman defends it off the back foot
length delivery on off, nudged towards square leg for a single
fuller length delivery a touch wide outside off, the batsman comes forward and pushes it to cover
wider this time, the batsman resists going after it, leaves it alone
length delivery on off stump, defended off the front foot
length delivery on off, the batsman comes forward and pushes it to cover

why play a shot like that! Angelo bowls a full length delivery honing in on the middle stump, and Mush goes for a heave and misses it. He was defending solidly and that shot was completely uncalled for as the run-rate has been good. Hits him right in front and an easy decision for the umpire
length delivery wide outside off, the batsman lets it go
on the pads, it is punched to deep midwicket off the front foot
comes forward and defends the length ball solidly to the off side
beats the bat with a quicker one outside off, the batsman went for the cut but it bounces extra
and another one beats the bat, this one is short of length outside off, the batsman gets squared up with the away movement
defends it off the back foot towards cover
gets an underedge to the keeper as he throws his bat at a slightly wide delivery
length delivery on off stump, it is pushed towards midwicket for a quick single
length delivery on off stump, the batsman stays on the back foot and chops it to the fielder standing at first slip
short of length delivery outside off, left alone
tries to guide this wide delivery to third-man but he doesn't move his feet at all, gets beaten
length delivery on off, defended towards cover off the back foot
length delivery on off stump, the batsman defends it from the crease
length delivery on the stumps, Tamim nudges it to deep midwicket
back of length outside off, Mahmudullah stands tall and defends it back to the bowler
short and wide, not much pace on that, the batsman goes on the back foot and whacks it past cover point for his first runs
defended off the back foot to the off side
length delivery on off stump, the batsman defends it to point
draws the outside edge as the batsman tries to push it to off without any feet movement, the ball drops just short of the fielder at first slip
he comes forward and drives it to cover
fuller length delivery outside off, the batsman still doesn't move his feet much but drives it through cover forcefully and finds the gap
fuller length delivery on off, he gets and inside edge towards fine-leg for a single
short delivery and the batsman sways away from the line just in time
length delivery on off stump, the batsman comes forward and dabs it towards the left of mid-on for a quick single
length delivery on off stump, defended to cover
tossed up delivery outside off, the batsman defends it to cover
flighted delivery outside off, the batsman punches it to deep cover for a single
floated on off stump, the batsman comes forward and pushes it to midwicket
flighted delivery on the middle, defended towards midwicket
goes on the back foot to a quicker one and gets the bat down in time
full and flighted on the off stump, it is worked away to deep square leg with the turn
length delivery outside off, defended off the back foot
length delivery on off stump, the batsman comes forward and runs it down to third-man
keeps it accurate on the stumps, the batsman defends it back to the bowler, then practices a slog...
length delivery on off stump, defended to point
slightly short delivery outside off, the batsman goes back to play the pull short but doesn't get his timing right and ends up pushing it to short midwicket
length delivery on the pads, worked away to deep square leg for a single
tossed up delivery on off stump, defended off the front foot
more front foot defence by the batsman
flighted on off stump, pushed to cover off the front foot
he dabs it towards the leg side and thinks about a single, but it is too close to the keeper
pushed through outside off, it is slightly short as well, the batsman punches it to deep cover
length delivery just outside off, the batsman defends it off the front foot
fuller delivery on off stump, the batsman comes forward and pushes it to mid-off
waits for this one just outside off and opens the face to steer it to third-man
goes for a yorker outside off, the batsman defends it easily, pushes it back to the bowler
short delivery, the batsman ducks under it easily
another yorker on off stump, the batsman jams his bat down
spins it past the outside edge as Tamim comes forward in defence
pushed through on off stump, the batsman comes forward and defends
drifts in on off stump, the batsman gets an inside edge towards square leg for a single
he goes down on his knee and paddles it fine on the leg side for a couple
drifts outside off from round the wicket, the batsman defends it to point
floated outside off stump, the batsman comes forward and defends it to off again
back of length delivery on the pads, Tamim tucks it to deep backward square leg to bring up his half-century
super shot, the batsman makes room by moving outside leg and drives it sweetly through extra cover
short delivery, a little slow as well, Mahmullah adjusts late and plays a flamingo shot down to fine leg
lovely strike! It's a length delivery and he just picks it up over the bowler's head
now he gets beaten outside the off as he tries to steer the length ball to third-man

oh no, what a drop. Drop of drops I say.  The batsman gets too adventurous, charges at the bowler and tries to send that over extra cover, but completely mistimes it. It lobs up high in the air towards mid-off where Angelo drops the simplest of chances
drifts on to the pads, the batsman nudges it fine on the leg side for a couple
shorter delivery, but this one spins a lot and messes with the batsman's timing as he goes for a cut
pushed through on the stumps, the batsman defends it to the leg side
pushed through on the stumps, he dabs it towards short fine-leg and calls for a quick single
tossed up on the middle stump line, dabbed to the right of midwicket for a quick single, could have been close if the throw was accurate
nudged to square leg for a single
length delivery on off stump, the batsman defends it to cover off the front foot
slightly short outside off, and he lashes at that one but hits it straight to Dilshan at point
stays in the crease and guides the back of length delivery on off to third-man
back of length delivery on off, squares up the batsman as he outside edges it to third-man
threads the gap at deep backward point beautifully. It was just short of length and he times it past point and it scoots to the boundary
he bowls it down the leg side and it's called a wide
length delivery on the stumps, defended to midwicket off the front foot
flighted delivery on the middle and leg, defended to square leg
full and flighted, but it is way down the leg side and Sanga does well to get a hand to that
floated outside off, the batsman comes forward and pushes it to deep cover
flighted delivery on off stump, the batsman comes forward and defends
he pulls out the reverse-sweep to paddle it fine on the off side for a couple
pushed through on off stump, the batsman defends it to off
full and flighted outside off stump, the batsman drives it to deep extra cover for a couple
slower delivery on the stumps, the batsman dabs it to the left of midwicket fielder for a quick single
length delivery outside off, the batsman tries to push at it without moving his feet at all, gets an inside edge back towards the bowler
back of length delivery on off, now he comes right behind it and defends it
length delivery outside off, he stays in the crease and guides it down to third-man
slower delivery on the pads, nudged to square leg for a single
comes forward and defends the length delivery to point
full and flighted on the stumps, the batsman drives it down to long-on
pushed through on off stump, the batsman comes forward and defends
full and flighted on off, he comes forward and drives it down to long-on
pushed through on the middle and leg line, flicked to deep square leg for a single
nudges it to square leg with the turn
flighted delivery on the pads, the batsman gets a little tickle on it and plays it fine on the leg side for a couple
picks the short length early and flogs it through midwicket, the fielder at deep square leg had no chance to cut it off
length delivery on the stumps, the batsman gets and outside edge to point
length delivery on off stump, he guides it to third-man for a single
length delivery on off stump, the batsman defends it to the off side
edged and gone! It's a length delivery just outside off, nothing much in it and the batsman pushes at it without getting anywhere close to the line, simple edge to the keeper
similar delivery that got Mahmudullah pushing forward, but Nasir leaves it alone
pushed through on off stump line, pushed back to the bowler
slower and flighted on off and middle, he comes forward and nudges it to square leg
tossed up delivery on the middle stump, he drives it past midwicket with turn
flighted up to the batsman, it is driven to short cover
slower, the batsman comes forward and defends
slightly short in length, the batsman pushes it to the left of midwicket and thinks about a single, but Nasir sends him back in time
length delivery wide outside off, some away movement on that too, Nasir leaves it alone
back of length delivery just outside off, the batsman punches it back to the bowler
length delivery on off stump, the batsman comes forward and pushes it to mid-on
driven to wide mid-off for a quick single
length delivery on the middle stump, the batsman dabs it towards point and calls for a quick single
fuller delivery on the stumps, the batsman flicks it to deep square leg for a single
tossed up delivery on off stump, the batsman goes back and punches it to deep midwicket
pushed through on off stump, the batsman comes forward and defends it back to the bowler
more front foot defence from the batsman, pushes it back to the bowler
slower and flighted on off, the batsman comes forward and defends to off
he is bowling really slow, pushed to midwicket
pushed through outside off, the batsman comes forward and punches it to deep cover
length delivery with a lot of width, Tamim cracks it to deep point
back of length delivery on the stumps, Nasir flicks it to deep backward square leg off the back foot
fuller length delivery on off, Tamim comes forward and pushes it down to long-off for a single
short delivery, the batsman goes for a pull but doesn't get hold of it, the ball drops few meters short of the fielder at deep midwicket
length delivery on off, the batsman cuts it on off, but Dilshan makes a good one-handed stop
back of length delivery outside off, the batsman punches it to deep cover off the back foot
pushed through on off stump, the batsman comes forward and defends
another one defended back tot he bowler
and Dilshan is keeping things tight, the batsman defends again
shorter delivery outside off, the batsman punches it to deep cover
he goes on the back foot and pushes it to long-on for a single
now Tamim plays a mirror-image shot, down to long-on
length delivery outside off, the batsman drives it down to long-off
length delivery on off, the batsman drives it to wide mid-off for a quick single
stays in the crease and chops the length delivery to the fielder at point
forceful punch off the back foot to deep cover for a single
short delivery, comes a little slow off the surface, messes up Nasir's timing as he goes for the pull
low full-toss on the leg stump, it is flicked down to fine-leg for a single
pushed through on off stump, defended off the back foot
pushed down the leg side from round the wicket, it's called a wide
tossed up delivery on the middle stump, the batsman defends to midwicket
pushed through on off stump, the batsman stays on the back foot and pushes it back to the bowler
pushed through on the leg stump, the batsman dabs it to midwicket and thinks of  a single, sent back in time
good delivery, drifts to the off stump and then spins into the batsman, He wasn't expecting it to come in.
waits on the back foot to this floater outside off, he cuts it back through point for a couple
low full-toss on off stump, the batsman is unable to get it away, pushes it to midwicket
slower back of length delivery on the leg stump, the batsman gets hit on the thigh pads as he misses his flick
low full-toss outside off, the batsman drives it to deep extra cover and picks up two
short delivery, doesn't get the timing right as he goes for the pull, finds the fielder at deep midwicket
slower delivery just outside off, it was short of length as well, the batsman sways out of line
another slower one, but this is wide outside off, Nasir blasts it off the back foot through cover
oh beautiful delivery, it drifted in and then spun and bounced past the outside edge
another drifter on the middle stump, the batsman nudges it fine on the leg side and calls for a quick single, but a wild throw comes in and overthrows are taken
goes on the back foot and pushes it to square leg for a single
pushes it through on off stump, the batsman goes back and defends
this time he goes wide outside off, but the ball beats the bat as it stays a bit low
on the pads, it is dabbed towards short fine-leg
bowls a full delivery, but this one is well wide outside off, another one for the extras column
another yorker, but this is wide outside off, the batsman blocks it out to cover
and another one, this one was slightly slower and the ball goes through to the keeper, very close to the edge
low full-toss wide outside off, the batsman stretches forward and pushes it to deep point for a single
short delivery on the body, it is glanced down to fine-leg for a single
goes for a pacy yorker on off stump, the batsman blocks it out back to the bowler
full delivery outside off, the batsman steers it down to third-man for a single
drifts down the leg side and the batsman is unable to get it away
goes for a sweep, but plays it straight to square leg
pushed through on off stump, the batsman comes forward and defends to off
quicker delivery on off stump, the batsman defends it off the back foot

full and flighted on the middle stump, the batsman pushes it to midwicket with soft hands and they take a couple, a throw comes from midwicket and hits the stumps, the batsmen take a run off the ricochet, the bowler then picks up and fires it towards striker's end, and Sanga is unable to stop that, another overthrow
this one drifts in and spins past the outside edge, Sanga takes the bails off in a flash, but the umpire is not interested. The umpire belatedly calls for a review, but the batsman is ok
slower delivery just outside off, the batsman has to wait and he steers it straight to point
length delivery on off stump, the batsman defends it towards point again
slower delivery wide outside off, the batsman is able to whip it through off side, gets a couple to deep point
fuller length delivery on off, the batsman goes after it but the slowness in that ball messes his timing, it goes to long-on
length delivery on off stump, pushed straight to point
short of length delivery, he gets a thick outside edge as he goes for the cut and it runs fine to the boundary. He brings up his century with that one - the first by a Bangladesh batsman in Sri Lanka
he comes down the track, is not to the pitch of the ball but goes through his swing anyway, it goes high and long over the long-on boundary
pushed through on the pads, it is flicked through to deep square leg for a single
pushed through on the pads, it is nudged to backward square leg for a single
flatter delivery on the leg stump, the batsman misses it and gets hit on the thigh pad
he plays it with soft hands towards cover and calls for a tight single
flighted delivery, the batsman comes forward and drives it to long-off
slower delivery on the leg stump, the batsman tries to glance it fine, but hits it straight to short fine leg
full delivery wide outside off, the batsman gets down on his knee and drives it to deep cover, only a single though
slower delivery, he spots it early and bludgeons it over long-on for a big six. The break seems to have worked in his favour
full and fast, the batsman guides it to deep point
another good yorker, the batsman blocks it out right next to the stumps but the non-striker calls for a quick one
low full-toss on the middle and leg stump, he pushes it to long-off for a single and keeps the strike
drifts on to the pads, the batsman nudges it to square leg for a single
short delivery wide down the leg side, could have been left but Nasir slaps it over deep backward square leg boundary for a six
full and flighted outside off, the batsman drives it to long-off

flatter delivery on the pads, the batsman flicks it to short fine leg and the batsmen call for a single, but the throw comes in nice and flat and Tamim is struggling at the striker's end. He is short by a mile. That is the end of a very good innings by Tamim.

sad end for the debutant as he is unable to get bat on the ball. It was a quicker one on the off stump, the batsman played for the turn off the back foot and played inside the line, then he hears the painful music of leather beating wood. Unlucky for the newbie
bowls a short and wide delivery outside off, the batsman cuts it down to deep backward point
bowls a low full-toss on off stump, Gazi slices it to deep cover for a single
another low full-toss on off, the batsman pushes it towards mid-on for a single
full delivery outside off, takes the edge and it flies past the wicketkeeper for a boundary
full delivery on off stump, the batsman pushes it to cover off the front foot
short delivery, the batsman somehow fends it off to point, the batsmen run halfway and then go back to their ends as Dilshan gets to the ball. That was an easy single..
caught at point! short delivery outside off, Gazi goes for a cut but the ball gets too big on him, he ends up just fending it to Dilshan at point
length delivery on off stump, the batsman drives it to cover and takes off for a single
back of length delivery on the middle stump, he pushes it to mid-on with soft hands and calls for a quick single
heaves the length ball on off, but doesn't get too much of timing on that one, it rolls towards deep midwicket
bowls a yorker on the middle stump which is dug out back to the bowler
goes for a slower ball, but it doesn't come out properly, it's a juicy full-toss and it's smacked to the deep midwicket boundary
full and quick on the middle and leg line, flicked away to deep backward square leg for a single
full delivery on off stump, the batsman pushes it to mid-off and takes a quick single
short delivery on the body, the batsman fends it in front awkwardly
another short delivery, but this one doesn't get up too much, defended back to the bowler
another short delivery, he manages to guide it to third-man for a single
goes for a yorker on off stump, but it's a half volley and Nasir swings it over mid-off for a one-bounce boundary
low full-toss on off stump, he slices it to deep cover to bring up his half-century. Well played Nasir
length ball outside off, he smashes this over mid-off again, couple of bounces and it goes to the boundary
bowls a quick inswinging yorker that misses the bat, misses the leg stump and Sanga just manages to get a hand to it
good yorker, the batsman blocks it out towards mid-off and takes off for a single
bowls a back-of-the-hand slower delivery, but it slips wide outside off, called a wide
length ball wide outside off, the batsman went after it but makes no connection. The ball was there to be hit, but he misses
and now he gets an outside edge and that runs to the third-man boundary. Kula has been very expensive today
finally Malinga gets his yorker on target and it hits the base of off stump, no chance for the batsman.
yorker on the pads, and the batsman walks across and flicks it to deep backward square leg
bowls another quick yorker outside off, the batsman misses
another full delivery, the batsman pushes it to mid-on and they take a risky single
full delivery wide outside off, the batsman guides it to deep backward point for a couple
low full-toss on the pads, it is flicked to deep square leg for a single that brings up Bangladesh's 250
short and wide, the batsman slaps it over cover for a single as there is a fielder in the deep
short of length delivery on the body, it is dabbed towards square leg for a single
full away swinging delivery outside off, the batsman goes for a booming drive but makes no contact
makes room by moving outside leg, he takes the ball on the full and creams this through extra cover,
short delivery follows the batsman as he makes room, he can just slap it to mid-off

short delivery, this is pulled hard towards deep midwicket where Senanayake holds on to the catch, but the momentum takes him outside the boundary rope, but he pushes the ball inside the playing area before he touched the rope. Keeps them to two.

inn2.comm: short and wide, crashed  through cover point. So this is what people have been talking about, the new Sanath, is it?
not much room with this short of length delivery, but he chops it down to third-man
back of length delivery outside off, swings a touch away, defended to point off the back foot
back of length delivery on off, pushed to cover point off the back foot
length delivery on off, the batsman punches it back to the bowler, who doesn't stop it cleanly and allows a single
oh almost got him with that one! It was short of length and came sharply into the batsman from round the wicket. He was shaping for the cut shot but was cramped for room
short and outside off, Dilshan goes back to cut but the ball comes in too quickly on to him, he pushes it straight to cover point
fuller length delivery angling in to the batsman, Dilshan punches it exquisitely past the bowler, lovely shot to start his day.
length delivery on off, this time he comes forward and pulls out a gorgeous drive through extra cover
bowls a low full-toss as he looks for a yorker, Dilshan makes him pay as he drives this through extra cover again
it's not so short, but Dilshan goes for a pull through midwicket, he doesn't get enough timing behind that but that still makes the fielder run all the way to the boundary behind it
fuller delivery outside off, he absolutely murders this one through cover point, all along the ground
another low full-toss outside off, Dilshan takes a step forward and just pushes it in the gap at cover with ease
full and wide and swinging away, the batsman frees his arms and creams it through extra cover, some violence here...
slightly short of length on off and middle, he pulls it immediately but now there is a fielder at deep midwicket
this time he doesn't go off side, he pulls it off the front foot to deep midwicket, a fielder is placed there
full delivery on off, the batsman drives it firmly to the short cover-point fielder
length delivery on off stump, the batsman comes forward and pushes it to mid-off
floated on leg stump, the batsman gets hit on the pads and it rolls towards short fine-leg
slow and slightly short outside off, Dilshan just wait an extra bit and cracks it through cover point again
this one was too full to cut and he gets beaten in his shot..
he bowls a slider on the leg stump, the batsman pushes it back to the bowler
tossed up delivery on the pads, it is driven to deep midwicket for a couple
slightly short again, the batsman waits on the back foot and slaps it past point for another boundary
short of length outside off, he just pulls it off the front foot, through square leg and it beats the man running from deep midwicket easily
back of length delivery outside off, defended off the back foot
length delivery, very wide outside off, the batsman throws his bat at that but doesn't connect, it was very wide and hence is called a wide
back of length delivery on off, pushed back to the bowler off the back foot
short of length outside off, more violence from the batsman, he blasts it with a tennis forehand, over the mid-on fielder
goes for a pull shot but misses it, and gets hit on the thigh pad. The bowler appeals for lbw, but I guess it's too high
short of length outside off, the batsman goes for a cut but inside edge it past the keeper for another boundary. Keep them coming...
tossed up outside off, the batsman goes back and cuts, hits it straight to backward point
tossed up outside off, the batsman comes down the pitch, but hits it straight to midwicket
tossed up delivery on off, the batsman comes forward and pushes it back to the bowler
flatter delivery outside off, he waits on the back foot and blasts the short delivery through cover
stays back to a fuller delivery and gets an outside edge very close to the lone-slip
now he waits in the crease and defends the flighted delivery back to the bowler
tossed up delivery on the stumps, the batsman works it towards square leg for a single
flighted delivery just outside off, the batsman defends it awkwardly from the crease
bowls it with a pause, but it's short and wide, the batsman cuts it  but the fielder at point does well to keep them to a single
full and flighted on the middle, driven down to long-on for a single
slaps a sweep to a flatter delivery and it goes straight to Razzak at deep midwicket who palms it over the boundary. Costly drop
they take a single off the last ball as the batsman cuts it to deep point and Kushal keeps the strike
comes down the pitch and drives the full delivery down to long-on
flighted delivery on the middle and leg line, driven down to long-off
he goes back and cuts the short ball through point for another three. Good running there
he comes forward and defends it back to the bowler
flighted delivery on the leg stump, the batsman goes for a sweep but misses it, it goes down the leg side
he stays on the back foot and pushes the flatter delivery to short cover
it's a touch short in length and the batsman chops it on to the off side and calls for a quick single
goes on the back foot and works it to deep backward square leg for a single
pushed through on the middle stump, defended back to the bowler
he goes on the back foot and steers the delivery towards backward point
fuller delivery on off, the batsman drives it down to long-on for a single
pushed through on the stumps, the batsman defends it towards midwicket
comes down the pitch and pushes the full delivery to long-on for a single
bowls length on off stump, 124 kph, the batsman defends it to the off side
back of length delivery, but this is on the pads and it's flicked away easily to deep backward square leg
strays on to the pads and Dilshan helps it on it's way to the fine-leg boundary. The umpire signals leg-byes
length delivery on off, the batsman stands tall and punches it to deep cover
bowls a slower delivery on the stumps, the batsman pushes it back to the bowler
another slower one just outside off, the batsman opens the face of the bat, but hits it straight to the fielder at point
pushed through on off stump, spins in a bit, punched back to the bowler
he goes on the back foot and turns the flatter delivery to deep midwicket
goes on the back foot and punches it to deep cover

worked away to deep midwicket with soft hands, the batsmen are quick to come back for a couple. The throw comes in from deep midwicket , hits the stumps and ricochets to the boundary. Four extra runs. The umpires check for a run-out, but Kushal is ok there and that's a fifty for Dilshan
straighter delivery wide outside off, the batsman goes for a cut and gets beaten
goes on the back foot and pushes it towards the gap at cover-point for a quick single
full delivery on the pads, it's flicked to deep midwicket for a single
back of length delivery on the stumps, the batsman punches it through mid-on for an easy ingle
another back of length delivery on off is punched to long-off
just short of length outside off, the batsman slaps it back to the bowler who does well to get out of the way, single to long-on
comes on the front foot and drives the length delivery to short cover
length delivery on off stump, driven back to the bowler

caught at first slip! Kushal's cameo has been cut short by a good delivery. The batsman comes down the pitch, but the ball dips on him and then turns a bit, takes a healthy outside edge straight into the hands of first slip
full and flighted wide outside off, the batsman pushes it to deep cover off the front foot
another full delivery on off stump, the batsman drives it down to long-on
pushed through on off stump, Sanga defends it back to the bowler
flatter delivery on the stumps, the batsman dabs it towards midwicket for a quick single
on the middle and leg line, the batsman punches it to deep midwicket for a single
on to the pads, it hits the pads and scuttles down to the fine-leg boundary
length delivery on the middle and leg line, punched to midwicket
he comes forward and pushes it to mid-on with soft hands and calls for a quick single
bowls a good slower delivery outside off and the ball beats the outside edge as Sanga tries to guide it down to third-man
another slower delivery, this time on the pads and Sanga easily drives it to deep midwicket for a single
back of length delivery outside off, the batsman defends it to cover off the front foot
full and flighted on the middle stump, driven straight to midwicket
tossed up delivery on off, he pushes it back to the bowler
pushed through on off stump, the batsman comes forward and drives it back to the bowler
flatter delivery, he gets a bit of an inside edge towards square leg as he comes forward in defence
flatter delivery outside off, Dilshan goes back and punches it to long-on
quicker one on off, the batsman dabs it to the off side and thinks of a single, Dilshan sends him back
fuller length delivery on off stump, driven to mid-on
he comes forward and pushes the length delivery to the gap at cover for a single
how easily does he do this do all the time! It is slightly wide outside off and he caresses it to deep point off the front foot with a stylish square drive
takes a couple of small steps and turns the length delivery past midwicket for a single
good accurate line around off stump, the batsman pushes it back to the bowler
back of length delivery, it is pushed with soft hands towards mid-on, quick single taken
comes forward and gets a leading edge which goes towards deep cover
comes down the pitch and drives the full and flighted delivery past the non-striker. He actually hits Dilshan with it, but the ball still races to the boundary
dabbed towards midwicket for a quick single
goes on the back foot and punches the back of length delivery to deep midwicket
full and flighted on the middle stump, driven down to long-on for a single
tossed up delivery on off, punched down to long-on
back of length on the middle stump, Dilshan whips it to deep square leg for a single

slower delivery on off stump, Sanga pushes it to mid-off and takes off, but he realises this was too close. Had the fielder hit, it would have been tight. Looks like he would have made it with that dive he put..
on the pads, the batsman misses it and it hits the pads, rolls to short fine leg
he opens the face of the bat to dab it to point, and the batsmen take a quick single
slower delivery outside off, Dilshan comes forward and drives it straight to short cover
he stands tall and punches the back of length delivery to mid-on
pushed through on the stumps, Sanga defends it
short-ish delivery on off stump, the batsman punches it to short cover
flatter delivery straying on to the pads, Sanga goes back and flicks it to deep backward square leg for a single
full and flighted outside off, he comes forward and slices it to deep point for a quick couple
tossed up on the middle stump line, the batsman drives it to deep midwicket
flighted delivery just outside off, the batsman pushes it back to the bowler
whipped through midwicket as soon as he sees length delivery on the pads, the ball is chased down by the fielder at mid-on
comes forward and pushes the length delivery to the fielder at midwicket
slower delivery outside off stump, the batsman comes forward and guides it to point
shorter delivery with some width outside off, the batsman punches it to deep cover
another slower delivery just on off stump, the batsman dabs it straight to cover point
he comes down a couple of steps and works the slower delivery to fine-leg for a single
on the pads, flicked to short fine leg for a quick single
full and flighted from round the wicket, driven with ease to long-off
flatter delivery on the middle stump, pushed into the gap at mid-on for a single
appeal for lbw as the batsman misses his flick, but this one was sliding down the leg side
full and flighted on off, another run to long-off
quicker delivery on off stump, the batsman stays on the back foot and pushes it back to the bowler
short of length delivery on off stump, the batsman defends it to  midwicket
length delivery, but it's honing on the off stump, the batsman punches it back to the bowler
slower delivery just outside off, the batsman chops it on the off side and Nasir from point dives and stops that brilliantly, but can't prevent a single
another slower ball on the stumps, Sanga pushes it back to the bowler
comes down the pitch and pushes the back of length delivery to extra cover for another quick single
back of length slower ball on off stump, Dilshan punches it back to him
goes for a sweep off a full delivery, but he misses and gets hit on the front pad, loud appeal for lbw, but the umpire reckons it was sliding down leg
fuller delivery, driven to long-on with ease
slightly shorter, the batsman comes back and cuts it to deep point for a single
comes down the pitch and drives the full delivery to long-on for a single
comes down the pitch and almost yorks himself, but ends up pushing it to mid-on for a quick single
tossed up outside off, the batsman clubs it down the ground to long-on
back of length delivery, Sanga gets inside the line and flicks it off the hips towards deep backward square leg for a couple
fuller delivery on the middle stump, driven to midwicket
slower and full on off stump, the batsman pushes it to mid-on
slower delivery on the stumps, the batsman dabs it towards cover point and calls for a quick single
back of length delivery on off, it is punched straight past the non-striker to the left of mid-on, the steal a quick single
back of length outside off, the batsman punches it to deep cover
full and flighted on the stumps, punched to midwicket
flatter and slower on off, the batsman waits and waits, and waits, and defends
comes down the pitch and gets under the ball, chips it easily over the bowler's head and it goes for a one-bounce four
comes down the pitch and drives this time, but the bowler does well to stick his left hand out and stop the possibility of a run
he comes forward and drives it to long-on for a single
pushed through on the pads, the batsman goes back and clips it to square leg for a single
short delivery outside off, the batsman watches it sail through to the keeper
fuller delivery on off stump, the batsman goes for an on-the-up drive, but it hits the toe of the bat and trickles towards third-man
bowls a good yorker on off stump, Sanga digs it out to the bowler
fuller delivery outside off, the batsman drives it nicely, but Gazi at cover makes an excellent diving stop
back of length delivery on the stumps, Sanga defends it off the back foot
good short delivery on the body, Sanga gets under it in time
flighted delivery outside off, the batsman defends it towards point
he comes forward and pushes the full delivery to extra cover
goes on the back foot and clips the flatter delivery to backward square leg for a single
comes down the pitch and pushes the flighted delivery to long-on for a single
tries to force the quicker delivery to off side, but gets an inside edge towards midwicket
another one pushed through on the off stump line, the batsman pushes it back to the bowler
full delivery wide outside off, the batsman pushes it to mid-off and steals a single
length delivery on off, the batsman punches it back to the bowler, who gets a hand to it and deflects it to mid-on
short delivery outside off, the batsman swivels and pulls it to deep square leg
back of length just outside off, the batsman gets on top of the bounce and dabs it to third-man
another short delivery, this time Dilshan goes in front of square and finds the boundary at deep midwicket

and this time he gets an outside edge through the vacant slip region. The ball was full and on off stump line, the batsman looked to push it straight down the ground but gets a healthy edge to move in to the nineties
comes down the pitch and pushes it to long-on for a single
full and flighted outside off, he slices it to point
comes forward and drives the slow flighted delivery to cover
short and flatter outside off, the batsman cuts it hard past point for a couple. Nasir at point did well to slow it down
comes forward and defends the length delivery back to the bowler
sliding down the leg side and it has been called a wide
another one slips down the leg side and Mush appeals for a caught behind, the umpire believes it has flicked the pad on its way
beautiful! He comes down the pitch and swings it over the umpire's head for one-bounce four, easily done
this time he waits on the back foot and guides the short of length delivery to third man
short delivery, sits up nicely and Dilshan whacks it to deep midwicket boundary
back of length just outside off, he stays in the crease and slaps it to deep backward point for a couple
slower delivery just outside off, the batsman pushes it to the left of cover and calls for another tight singl
length delivery on off, pushed towards the right of mid-off and another single is stolen
comes down the pitch, but Razzak fires it on the pads, defends it to midwicket
flatter delivery on the stumps, turned away to deep square leg for a single
clips it easily towards square leg to bring up his 15th ODI century. Very well-paced innings by Dilshan.
comes down the pitch and punches it to long-on
bowls a quicker one down the leg side, Dilshan sweeps it but hits it straight to short fine leg
this time he sweeps it fine on the leg side, gets a couple by the time short fine-leg fetches it
bowls a wide down the leg side
tossed up delivery outside off, the batsman punches to deep cover
floats it wide outside off and Dilshan punches it off the back foot to deep extra cover
on the pads, Dilshan works it to deep backward square leg for a single
tossed up wide outside off, pushed to deep point with an open face
tossed up delivery on off stump, driven to deep point
comes down the pitch and yorks himself, gets an inside edge towards midwicket
fuller delivery outside off and Sanga will feast on those blindfolded, it is creamed to the extra cover boundary and he gets to his half-century
short of length delivery just outside off, he chops it to third-man off the back foot
back of length delivery just outside off, pushed to point off the front foot
short delivery with not much bounce, he swivels and spanks it to deep midwicket
oh nicely played, it was just a good delivery on off and the batsman goes back and steers it to the boundary at deep backward point
length delivery on off stump, Sanga drives it back to the bowler
comes down the track and goes for a wild swing, completely misses that one
slower delivery, back of length on the pads, he works it to deep backward square leg for a couple
full delivery on off, the batsman drills it to long-off
fuller length delivery on the pads, it flicks the pads on its way to short fine leg
slightly short of length outside off, the batsman punches it to deep point off the back foot
slower delivery on off, pushed firmly off the front foot to mid-off
full delivery on the pads, the batsman misses his flicks and it hits the pads on its way to short fine-leg fielder
fuller delivery outside off, Sanga goes down on his knee and drives it over mid-off, it bounces a couple of times before getting to the boundary
and another one, this time it goes along the ground and through his favourite extra-cover area, the fielder slides and keeps the ball inside the field.
short ball, comes in a bit quickly and messes with Dilshan's timing as he goes for the pull, it goes towards midwicket
a strange shot by Dilshan. It was a short delivery wide outside off, the batsman was shaping for a pull, then decided to pull-out, but he was too late. The ball hits the bat and goes to third-man
caught at third-man! Sanga goes while playing an upper cut, he times it too well and straight into the hands of Ziaur. He falls on the doorstep of a win
flighted delivery on off, the batsman pushes it to long-on for a single
tossed up delivery on the leg stump, Chandimal pushes it to midwicket
full and flighted delivery on the middle, pushed to cover
flatter and shorter outside off, Chandimal goes back and slaps it through cover and runs three
